statistics.title: Task Statistics
statistics.description: Review the latest records of executed tasks and their progress.

completedTasks.title: Completed tasks
completedTasks.description: Tasks you have completed, ordered by the latest updates.

table.empty: There are no completed task records yet.

timeline.empty: No task execution logs are available yet.

login.title: Log in
login.demo: You are trying to log in to a demo version of a service. In the demo version, data may be deleted without prior notice. Additionally, in the demo version, it is possible to log in as a guest account.

error.notMatch: These credentials do not match our records.

register.title: Register
register.demo: You are trying to sign up to a demo version of a service. In the demo version, data may be deleted without prior notice. Additionally, in the demo version, it is possible to log in as a guest account.

error.notMatch: These credentials do not match our records.

forgotPassword.title: Forgot Password
forgotPassword.description: Forgot your password? No problem. Just let us know your email address and we will email you a password reset link that will allow you to choose a new one.

confirmPassword.title: Confirm Password
confirmPassword.description: This is a secure area of the application. Please confirm your password before continuing.

verifyEmail.title: Email Verification
verifyEmail.description: Thanks for signing up! Before getting started, could you verify your email address by clicking on the link we just emailed to you? If you didn't receive the email, we will gladly send you another.
verifyEmail.linkSent: A new verification link has been sent to the email address you provided during registration.

updateProfileInformation.title: Profile Information
updateProfileInformation.description: Update your account's profile information and email address.
updateProfileInformation.resend: Click here to re-send the verification email.
updateProfileInformation.verificationLinkSent: A new verification link has been sent to your email address.

updatePassword.title: Update Password
updatePassword.description: Ensure your account is using a long, random password to stay secure.

deleteAccount.title: Delete Account
deleteAccount.description: Once your account is deleted, all of its resources and data will be permanently deleted.

modal.title: Are you sure you want to delete your account?
modal.description: Once your account is deleted, all of its resources and data will be permanently deleted. Please enter your password to confirm you would like to permanently delete your account.

dangerZone.title: Danger Zone (Tauri)
dangerZone.description: These controls are available only in the Tauri single-user build. Use them to inspect or reset the embedded backend state.
dangerZone.confirm: Resetting will delete the local SQLite database (including WAL/SHM files), the JWT secret, and the initialization marker. You must restart the app to bootstrap again. Continue?
dangerZone.note: After deleting the data, close the app completely and reopen it so the backend can recreate the database.

toast.resetSuccess: Local data deleted. Restart the app to run the bootstrap again.

storeRelation.403: Permission denied: You cannot add tags to this task.
storeRelation.200: Successfully created tag and associated it with the task.

destroyRelation.403: Permission denied: You cannot remove tags to this task.
destroyRelation.200: Successfully removed tag from the task.

update.403: Permission denied: You cannot update this task.

destroy.403: Permission denied: You cannot delete this task.

updateCompletion.403: Permission denied: You cannot update this task.

getTasksByTagId.200: Tasks retrieved successfully based on tag.

update.403: Permission denied: You cannot update this decopon session.

destroy.403: Permission denied: You cannot delete this decopon session.
